Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbal community, I have been lurking this fourm since I was on Google looking for a space program game. I\'ve been in the search of something exactly like KSP for a few years now, I\'ve tried orbiter and it wasn\'t my style. I wanted to build my own space ships and more casual.

My adventures in KSP have been a bit funny, and some times more serious. I\'ve nearly landed on the mun within my first week (using others ships). I have mastered basic things like orbiting how high I want, getting to the Mun quickly, and orbital linkup. However, I cannot land within 100 miles of where I want yet, but I\'ve been picking up the skills needed recently.

The amount of things to do is KSP might seem small with only Kerbal, the Mun, and Kerbol. Yet that has not stoped my from challenging myself with the things in the challenges section, or launching a 3 stage rocket with all the SRB\'s I can find, and a few RCS trying to get into orbit. The developers have done a great job on this game, and I have officially donated my first $10 and will try to donate $5 every payday until I feel like I\'ve paid them back for the days of fun. KSP is has limitless potential, and I like where it is going, keep up the good work and keep talking with the community to add new features and KSP will soar into the unknown.

GutenTag and welcome to the forums! Hope you enjoy your stay. (PS: when knowing where you will land take into account atmospheric drag.)

---Herr Presidente

GutenTag and welcome to the forums! Hope you enjoy your stay. (PS: when knowing where you will land take into account atmospheric drag.)

---Herr Presidente

I\'m working on that now, but I don\'t do or know any of the math equations so I normally just eyeball it and try to land close enough.
Welcome to the forums! Enjoy your stay!

Hello!

Welcome to the forums!

Glad to have you here!

Your friendly neighborhood bag of bones,

Drakomis

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Awesome first post!

You introduced yourself very well.

Welcome to the forums!

But ehhh... '$5 every payday until I feel like I\'ve paid them back for the days of fun'. How much is that ? Anyway, don\'t donate to much money yet, so you have some left for if they add merchandise, like Kerbal plushes (also see my signature for my KSP merchandise idea)

If you want someone else to enjoy the further KSP updates, you do some worth with your donations by giving someone else, who don\'t have a credit card, a copy, like me. no offence.,

But ehhh... '$5 every payday until I feel like I\'ve paid them back for the days of fun'. How much is that ? Anyway, don\'t donate to much money yet, so you have some left for if they add merchandise, like Kerbal plushes (also see my signature for my KSP merchandise idea)

If you want someone else to enjoy the further KSP updates, you do some worth with your donations by giving someone else, who don\'t have a credit card, a copy, like me. no offence.,

Well, I\'ve paid $60 for games I\'ve gotten less fun out of, so at least that easily. About merchandise, that really isn\'t my thing unless I\'m gifting it. An do you have a full copy of the game? Because if we can work it out with Harvester I would gladly buy it for you over the course of a month.

An do you have a full copy of the game?

No. I don\'t have a credit card.

No. I don\'t have a credit card.

Hehe, how would I go about giving you the license? I might not get it in time for .14.0 But I am going to nab it before the price increase.

Hehe, how would I go about giving you the license? I might not get it in time for .14.0 But I am going to nab it before the price increase.

I don\'t know. I\'m not sure if I want you to spend money for getting me a copy of KSP...

I don\'t know. I\'m not sure if I want you to spend money for getting me a copy of KSP...

Haha, how about you trade me a service then? Anything your good at?
I don\'t know. But some people say I\'m good at photoshop.

Welcome engineer!

I agree with your sentiment completely. While there are few places to go so far, there is still a mountain of fun to be had. More importantly the potential for this game is almost limitless, add the awesome modding community and I Know this game is going to be a huge hit. Maybe even bigger than Minecraft.

cheers,

Thor
